title: ❗MINUTES FROM HYDE PARK & LOOP❗: STUDIO Apt w/ Heat & Water Included
posting_body: ['Spacious studio apartments available in Hyde Park/Kenwood - Boulevard Address', 'Vintage, well manicured building with courtyard, on-site management, security cameras, convenient laundry facility, and bike room!', '🚴', '✔️Includes: Kitchen Appliances, hardwood/laminate floors, doorbells with intercoms', '🚗', 'Off-street parking lot located to the north of the building with assigned parking for extra monthly fee, while spots are available', 'Less than 2 miles from University of Chicago (to the south); less than 2 miles from IIT (to the northwest); less than 4.5 miles from University of Illinois - Chicago (to the northwest); less than 4.5 miles from Columbia College (to the north)', 'Excellent public transportation 🚌, short distance to Lake Shore Drive 🤽🏽\u200d♀️', 'Beautiful Boulevard bike path 🚴\u200d♂️ and walker friendly area🚶🏽\u200d♀️', 'Both University of Chicago and CPD service area', 'Rent: $890 and up with heat and water included!', '👏', '📅 In-person and virtual tours are available!', 'Office Hours: M-F; 9 am to 5 pm', 'For more information, please call our office at 📱 (866) 451-6837 or visit our online website - <URL> to learn more.']
